name: The Creature in the Darkness
description:
Mini Story In some strange way you found yourself in a strange room, there is no light, only walls, floor and ceiling. All would not be so scary, if it were not for the creatures that live here, and very much want to kill you. So you have to always be on the lookout, good luck!  Tutorial
 You will have a timer on your screen. It counts down in seconds and is equal to three minutes. This is the time you need to last anyway. And when the timer reaches zero, the door that leads you out of this strange labyrinth will be open. And you can leave the place, but it's not so easy, because you will be constantly interfered by nextbots. Gradually there are more and more of them, so you need to be careful, and consider every turn and corner. Control WASD to move LShift to running Thanks I will be very pleased if you rate my game, write a comment here and support me, thanks!
